name: spac_calendar
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spachero_spac_database.
Tool description: Official spacHero  SPAC API  with live rankings, SPAC target names, merger meetings, warrant redemption deadlines, price targets, SEC filings, investor presentations and more.
API description: Get important SPAC dates such as merger meetings dates, warrant redemption deadlines, definitive agreement dates, unit split (estimate), SPAC deadline (estimate).

Available options: merger, split, deadline, redemption

type.description: The type of SPAC date information desired. Available options are 'merger', 'split', 'deadline', and 'redemption'.
